source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a wide, scenic shot of a college football game at Northwestern University's Ryan Field. The stands are filled with a large crowd, many wearing purple, watching the players on the green field below. In the background, beyond the stadium, a line of trees and some buildings are visible under a cloudy, overcast sky. The camera slowly pans from right to left, offering a broader view of the stadium and the game day atmosphere.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a wide, scenic shot of a college football game at Northwestern University's Ryan Field. The stands are filled with a large crowd, many wearing purple, watching the players on the green field below. In the background, beyond the stadium, a line of trees and some buildings are visible under a cloudy, overcast sky. The camera slowly pans from right to left, offering a broader view of the stadium and the game day atmosphere.

generated_critique: The provided caption incorrectly focuses on the camera's movement rather than the motion of the subjects, which are the players and the crowd. While the caption mentions players on the field, it fails to describe their actions, which are the central point of interest in a football game. For instance, the video might show the two teams lined up at the line of scrimmage before the offense executes a running play, with the running back taking a handoff and moving through a gap in the defensive line. The caption also misses the opportunity to describe the collective motion of the crowd; as the play unfolds, sections of the audience could be seen standing up, cheering, and waving their arms in reaction. A more effective description would omit the static details about the location and weather and instead provide a chronological account of the players' movements during the play and the subsequent, dynamic reaction from the spectators in the stands.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: As the two teams line up at the line of scrimmage, the offense prepares to execute a running play. The quarterback hands the ball off to the running back, who swiftly maneuvers through a gap in the defensive line. The crowd erupts with excitement, sections of fans standing, cheering, and waving their arms in support as the play unfolds on the field.
